TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DSAKeyValue extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause

span.span: Represents the private key of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il classe rappresenta il `` elemento che contiene un chiave pubblica.The class represents the `` element, which contains a public key. Utilizzare per identificare la chiave pubblica che corrisponde alla chiave privata utilizzato per creare la firma digitale.Use to identify the public key that corresponds to the private key that was used to create the digital signature. Se una chiave non viene fornita al costruttore, in modo esplicito un nuovo coppia di chiavi Ã¨ generata casualmente.If a key is not explicitly supplied to the constructor, a new key pair is randomly generated. La classe viene utilizzata con le firme XML.The class is used with XML signatures. Per ulteriori informazioni sulla specifica W3C, vedere http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.For more information about the W3C specification, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare la classe nella crittografia XML per creare una firma disconnessa.The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in XML encryption to create a detached signature. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/CPP/exampledetached.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/CS/exampledetached.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/VB/exampledetached.vb#1)] Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare la classe nella crittografia XML per creare una firma di busta.The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in XML encryption to create an envelope signature. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/CPP/exampleenvelope.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/CS/exampleenvelope.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/VB/exampleenvelope.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a new, randomly-generated public key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando si crea un nuovo chiave, il costruttore utilizza l'implementazione predefinita di definiti dalla classe.When creating a new key, this constructor uses the default implementation of as defined by the class.
